content:
When an asteroid hits Earth, the amount of damage it causes depends primarily on the asteroid’s kinetic energy, which is given by the equation: KE = ½ mv2

In this equation KE is the kinetic energy of the asteroid, m is the mass, and v is its velocity. Note that the velocity is squared in the equation.
